title: Rock Creek Park: Park Home
body: Rock Creek Park  Rock Creek Park is truly a gem in our nation's capital. It offers visitors opportunity to reflect and soothe their spirits through the beauty of nature. Fresh air, majestic trees, wild animals, and thousands of years of human history emanate the delicate aura of the forest. We invite you to Find Yourself in Rock Creek Park and help celebrate the Park Service's 100th birthday.                Hiking in Rock Creek Park   An extensive network of trails and paths cover Rock Creek Park. Enjoy one today.        The Sky Above Us   The Rock Creek Park Planetarium uses high-tech Spitz software to project the image of the night sky onto a large, dome-shaped ceiling.            Beach Drive Rehabilitation   Beach Drive is being rehabilitated. Plan ahead.
